reviewText: Have been involved with firearms training for more than 35 years and have used the video as a training aid on dozens of occasions over this time. The NRA video is the best of it's kind  introduction to the fundamentals of Olympic target shooting. This is the second of these videos I have purchased. The first was misappropriated and it has taken about four years to locate another copy.

This is an educational VHS by some of the best masters of shooting that America has known.
Basic shooting education for the intermediate shooter to learn and use.
